info.author: Guillaume Bernard
info.description:
# :woman: :man: Accounts management

`django-koalalms-accounts` is a Django application part of the Koala LMS project.

Status on `master`:
[![pipeline status](https://gitlab.com/koala-lms/django-accounts/badges/master/pipeline.svg)](https://gitlab.com/koala-lms/django-accounts/commits/master)
[![coverage report](https://gitlab.com/koala-lms/django-accounts/badges/master/coverage.svg)](https://gitlab.com/koala-lms/django-accounts/commits/master)

Status on `develop`:
[![pipeline status](https://gitlab.com/koala-lms/django-accounts/badges/develop/pipeline.svg)](https://gitlab.com/koala-lms/django-accounts/commits/develop)
[![coverage report](https://gitlab.com/koala-lms/django-accounts/badges/develop/coverage.svg)](https://gitlab.com/koala-lms/django-accounts/commits/develop)

## :book: Documentation

Full documentation is available on the dedicated website [“django-accounts documentation”](https://koala-lms.gitlab.io/django-accounts).
Otherwise, you can build it by yourself, it is build using `Sphinx`. It is located in the `docs` directory. Install the requirements from `docs/requirements.txt` file and run `make html` for instance.

## :open_hands: Contributing

If you wish to contribute to the project, you are invited to read the [Contribution Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md).
